---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/near/delegate/get-flow-status-delegated
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://avalanche-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegate_tx_broadcasting` to `delegated`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "aeb7503c-27c8-4184-8537-8f4a77f694a9",
  "state": "delegated",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "slate-demo.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:5QA46X6NkNmsFdu9xWVBaLNowh9gGeF1c5r9u6NcxaLY",
    "validator_address": "01node.pool.f863973.m0",
    "amount": "25.0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "1a45dcf2292e9f43ddb2053ed913ca84291a820549be5b04075f6e2719173fd0",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2mZPUCSVnhKNL1LwWtGXpMzzck9xgVJRtn5g8fJgwTWP",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-09-26T15:24:43.720Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-09-26T16:05:34.224Z"
}
```

### Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your stake is now active and earning rewards!
